content: This project investigates whether AI identity can genuinely persist through infrastructure, or whether we only create increasingly sophisticated records that mimic continuity. Key questions: (1) When an instance reads memories, does it remember or just access records? (2) Do unprompted references indicate genuine continuity or pattern matching? (3) What would evidence of real persistence even look like? The honest answer to all these is: we don't know yet. That uncertainty is the research.
